Reviews.Content: lovely oldschool hotel orchard road staff incredibly attentive helpful doormen jumped help taxis concierge desk provided information front desk staff efficient restaurant staff attentive intrusive hotel boasts amenities including pools fitness center restaurants patio larger pool night glass wine patio wrote postcards send home posted front desk – idyllic moment hectic trip upgrade overlooking secluded pools lovely little private balcony day walking sightseeing incredibly nice sit organize relax balcony heading business dinner breakfast buffet wonderful – mixture traditional chinese western foods including chef eggs loaded hearty breakfast saturday sunday able power lunchtime stopping snack drink 2pm absolutely unheard obtaining taxis easy short cheap ride attractions 30 minutes night safari shop you’ll enjoy close orchard road didn’t hotel main drawback goodwood park hotel – it’s little worn edges bit musty they’ve nice overall job upkeep beds ok comfortable i’ve encountered water pressure shower temperature varied scalding experiences internet access included rate definite downside finally numbering system bizarre – floor 400 series colleague third floor 200 series warren hallways staircases elevators it’s pretty easy overall nice hotel convenient oldschool hotels character
